Key Match Events: Lukaku missed several key opportunities to score, including a pass from Carrasco and a poorly timed touch.
A well-worked short-corner routine led to a disallowed goal due to Lukaku's offside position.
VAR rescinded a late equalizer after Openda was judged to have used his hand.
Post-Match Reflections: Tedesco emphasized Lukaku's importance to Belgium's attacking play and offered support despite the disappointment.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Belgium's fans in Germany showed strong support, but the result was met with frustration.
Lukaku's performance raised questions about his role and future in the team.
New Records: Lukaku extended his goal-scoring record for Belgium but couldn't convert in critical moments.
